weekly_top_story.headline: Romania finds possible drone fragments after Russian strikes on Ukrainian ports
weekly_top_story.summary: Romanian authorities discovered drone fragments near their southeastern border following Russian attacks on Ukrainian ports, highlighting continuing regional tensions and the risk of cross-border conflict spillover.

stories.headline: Indonesian Teen Suspected in Mosque Bombing Assembled Explosives at Home
stories.summary: An Indonesian teenager suspected of last week's high school mosque bombing independently built explosives influenced by online extremist material, with no proven militant ties, raising concerns about lone-wolf radicalization.

stories.headline: Taiwan Evacuates Thousands Ahead of Tropical Storm Fung-wong
stories.summary: Taiwan preemptively evacuated over 3,000 residents and closed schools and offices as Tropical Storm Fung-wong approaches, reflecting heightened climate resilience measures in the face of increasing storm threats.

stories.headline: Suicide Bombing Outside Islamabad Court Kills 12 and Injures 27
stories.summary: A suicide bombing near a police vehicle outside an Islamabad district court caused 12 deaths and wounded 27, underscoring ongoing security challenges in Pakistan.
